extendedInfo.description: Focus on Above is a free app designed to encourage you in your walk with Christ.  Use it to organize bible verses, prayer requests, quotes, todo items, and just about any other category you can think of.  This app features1) Efficient user interface for entering reminders, applying priorities, setting favorites, and adding to the flashcard list, 2) Quick search large reminder lists 3) Unique system of organizing reminders into multiple Lists.  Built-in Lists include "Verse", "Prayer Request", "ToDO", "Quotes", and "ALL REMINDERS"4) Configurable single-occurrence or repeating alarms(e.g., hourly, daily, weekly, monthly),5) List Alarms, allowing the user to randomly be reminded of a reminder in a particular List6) Flashcards tried-and-true review.  Also features a text-to-speech automatic review.I pray this app is a blessing to you.  I'd love to hear your thoughts, comments, and suggestions!

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: But...all of the sudden I\'m not getting the reminders.  It\'s been 2 days now. I\'ve tried everything.
reviews.author: Darin Fisher

reviews.title: Nothing like it out there!
reviews.comment: Great idea!  Would like to see font size adjustable for us old folks.
reviews.author: Kim Kipp
